column1: '''''parma''''' is a noun meaning "book" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>

left]]''Parma'' is also the name in Quenya of the second letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  It is the second letter of the first grade or [[Tyellë]], which contains "voiceless stops" and it is the first letter in the labial or ''p''-series of consonants, the ''[[Parmatéma]]''.  In all modes ''Parma'' represents '''P'''.<ref>{{App
column3: Letters}}</ref>  The [[Westron]] name for this letter is '''''Pí'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]].</ref>

column1: The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme
